items.name: Carry Us All
items.desc:
Carry us all has been brewed as part of our ‘Year of Beer’ range for 2020. It is a light
and hoppy table beer overflowing with flavours of peach, tangerine and lychee.
ABV 2.5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS  Sabro / Citra / Amarillo / Bru-1
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Wheat / Carapils / Munich
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.

items.name: Cocoa Wonderland
items.desc:
A full bodied, robust porter with natural mocha malt flavours from the complex malt grist, complementing the decadent additions of real chocolate to the maturation process.
ABV 6.8% / 330ml bottle
HOPS Magnum
MALTS Pale / Munich / Brown / Crystal / Wheat / Black
SPECIALTY Cacao Nibs

items.name: Florida Weisse
items.desc:
A hazy and refreshing fruit sour that is bracingly tart. It pours with a pinkish hue and is absolutely brimming with the flavour of fresh raspberries. This product is Vegan friendly.
ABV 4.5% / 330ml can
HOPS None
MALTS Low Colour Maris Otter / Wheat
SPECIALTY Raspberries

items.name: Green Mountain
items.desc:
A beautiful hazy Vermont Session IPA. We generously dry hop with Galaxy, Mosaic, Citra and Amarillo hops, creating a hugely aromatic and juicy fruit bomb. This product is vegan friendly.

items.name: Little By Little
items.desc:
This dark and indulgent low alcohol milk stout beer combines light flavours of coffee with a roasted, creamy mouthfeel. At just 0.5% it's perfect if you’re cutting back on the booze in January.

items.name: Myddle
items.desc:
Why not make up your own case?
We have created Myddle with the award-winning Salopian brewery as part of
our 15th birthday celebrations. Notes of sweet orange and light pine blend
exquisitely with flavours of biscuit and burnt caramel from the robust malt.
ABV 6.2% / 330ml bottle
HOPS  Centennial / Cascade / Mosaic
MALTS Maris Otter / Munich / Wheat / Crystal / Dark Crystal / Caramalt
This item is bottle conditioned
Bottle conditioning has numerous benefits to the beer in bottle:
- Oxygen reduction, keeping the beer fresher for longer.
- Tighter CO2 bubbles, which gives a softer, more gentle feel in terms of
carbonation.
- The beer is reseeded with live yeast; this means the yeast will be busy doing
its own ’home improvements’ as the beer continues to mature in the bottle.

items.name: Shelby - The Official Beer of the TV Series
items.desc:
The official beer of Peaky Blinders the TV series. Shelby is an India Pale Ale inspired by the style of beer consumed in 1919, at the time of The Peaky Blinders.
Shelby pours a golden amber in colour with a nose of stone fruit and red berries, a gentle maltiness on the palate and a wonderful citrusy lemon bitterness.
By Order of The Shelby Company LTD
ABV 5% / 330ml bottle
HOPS Fuggles / Bramling Cross
MALTS Maris Otter/ Crystal / Munich
You must be 18 or over to purchase this product.
